name: CANDY THE CAT GETS A GUN
name_original: CANDY THE CAT GETS A GUN
description:
It's a side scrolling, plat-forming shooter. I watched the Shaun Spalding plat-former tutorial and this is my own spin on it. There's five levels but I may add more. I want to add more vertical platforms, other guns, etc. but I have no idea how to right now as I'm still learning GML. Any tips on GML would be appreciated. Otherwise enjoy and thanks for playing!

Game is in a ZIP file.
